title: Sustainability Education Project Utilizing Digital Data Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis and digital tool proficiency, general understanding of sustainability concepts, and foundational civic competencies for addressing social issues
context.additional_context: Professional training focused on developing practical data storytelling skills for workplace application. Emphasizes citizen-participatory project design using BYOD collaboration tools, with requirements for sustainability strategies considering economic, political, and cultural contexts

learning_goals: Complete a data story that collects and analyzes sustainability-related data, delivers it in digital formats (video/infographics), and proposes social impact strategies and citizen engagement plans
Design and implement a communication strategy that effectively delivers analytical insights tailored to the socio-economic characteristics of the target audience
Through PBL team projects, systematically document and present data-driven problem-solving processes, and evaluate applicability to local communities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
